attributes.additional_details: Driffield  lollipop man  hand in notice after been told he is not allowed to high 5 children. Stacey Hall took the roll over from his father Thomas hall Hater he retired after doing 38 years service to the school. This morning july 4th Stacey was approached by the school and told he is no longer allowed to hi 5 the children. Please sign this petition if you believe this is an outrage and mr Stacey Hall should carry on the great job he is doing whilst getting a playful slap on the hand in the process
